name: task_status
description: Check the status and progress of a background task. Returns the task state (pending, running, completed, failed, cancelled), progress percentage, and timing information. Use the task_id returned by batch_bom_calculate, bulk_price_check, or full_quotation.

task_id.description: The task identifier returned when the task was submitted (e.g., 'TASK-A1B2C3D4')
